questions.question_text:
Northern Trail Outfitters wants to copy journeys across business units.
What could be used to replicate journey structure so it can be easily recreated in another account?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Access to Query Studio can be enabled to a specific user or all the users within the Business Unit. After installing it from the Appexchange, Go to Setup -> Installed Packages -> Query Studio. Under the 'License' tab, select the business unit and select the user(s) as needed.
Query Studio is free
B is correct
A. Allow access package access on appropriate Roles
Answer A
A is correct.
The correct answer is A

choices.A: Allow access package access on appropriate Roles
choices.C: Configure the API Integration to allow all users access
choices.B: License all appropriate users within the installed package

questions.question_text:
Northern Trail Outfitters installed Query Studio for Marketing Cloud, however, users are reporting they do NOT have access.
How should the Marketing Cloud admin ensure users have access?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Explanation:
List Detective is the error code that the file would contain for this record. List Detective is a feature that filters out invalid, malformed, or problematic email addresses from being imported or sent to in Marketing Cloud. List Detective uses a set of rules and filters to check email addresses for syntax errors, spam traps, role accounts, or blocked domains. If an email address fails the List Detective validation, it will not be imported or sent to and the file will contain an error code of List Detective

Selected Answer: B
When you import a file into All Subscribers in Salesforce Marketing Cloud, if any records couldn't be imported due to issues like data validation or conflicts, those records are typically included in a "Skipped Records" section in the results file

Selected Answer: A
A is correct.

Selected Answer: B
List Detective is a tool that maintains information on email addresses and domains that could cause deliverability problems for your email sends. So A can not be the right anwer

Northern Trail Outfitters was given a set of requirements from their governance team to protect against misuse of customer data.
